snippet: The Yankees have never opened the season at home or on the road on Friday the 13th. Their record on Friday the 13th over all in the Derek Jeter era is 6-8.
abstract: The Yankees have never opened the season at home or on the road on Friday the 13th. Their record on Friday the 13th over all in the Derek Jeter era is 6-8.

headline.main: Yankees Face Unknown on Friday the 13th
